channel.title: Adressment to modelers
channel.description:
Hello, I have been helping this forum for a long time now, if I was a troller, I wouldn't have come back right? I never meant for (my honesty) to fuck you guys up so much..
This is acceptable under 'this' section as it is to do with issues in this board.
No tubefish, I don't hate you, disrespect is a sign of a liar, if I'm being honest, how the fuck is that trolling? Yes.. I soo need that p90x stuff, do you know me? I don't know you so I don't fucking judge your ass off, I may be fat, I may not, but how do you know if I am or not?
I am sorry for being honest, and now, here's a lie (I will be staying on theese forums)..
I have had enough! Of this.. I can't say anything.. So if thats the case I will not be modeling any further, and I don't want to waste time staying trying to help you people if you are going to hate me so much..
I have said I will be quitting many times, I thought that you people could change but obviously I am wrong.. This time I will not be returning..
Farewell, thank tubefish and whip of soulz, and all other (trollers) on here..
Then again, I don't post shit in the section called 'H1 SK1LL3R' right? Thats another sign of trolling
Goodbye.. Thanks for your trolling, it really helped me, thanks for the people that liked my work..

item.title: Adressment to modelers
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Goodbye, i’ll have to lock this thread though.

Read full topic

item.title: Adressment to modelers
item.dc:creator: @rockin_it rockin it
item.description:
@rockin_it wrote:

I’m Straight up new and I Think That evryone has a point skiller if your the only one on your side, Their has to bea reason everyone dislikes you if you troll or flame or whatever.

Thanks,
Some Newb

P.S - Skiller Stop typing I wish(moparscape) would stop it. etc. its annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: Adressment to modelers
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Hmm, well I tried defending you for a while, but I guess i always get proven wrong by you again and again. Get the fuck over yourself, stop cursing wherever you can in your sentences, stop thinking you are the best and can tell someone their model sucks, and lastly, just get the fuck out for the final time, you’re obviously not wanted here.

Read full topic

item.title: Adressment to modelers
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

1: stop using profanity in every sentence, it doesnt make you cool.
2: stop being an attention whore by creating a topic like this and saying you are quitting(multiple times)
3: since when was this the drama section?
4: yes, you are a flaming troll who cant control his emotions.

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:9, topic:365919”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=462116.msg3380645#msg3380645 date=1287988974]
Moparscape isn’t going to change any time soon mostly because of people like you to be completely honest. I am not stuck up like you, I will admit that I have trolled and flamed even spammed before, but for you to sit here and say you haven’t then…well…stop being so stuck up.
[/quote]

I’m stuck up? It won’t change, your right, because you will continually flame people and then they will fight back like me, I’m not stuck up, I just hate people who are as rude as you, I don’t intend to troll and if being honest on this forum is considered trolling, it just proves that it’s worse again…

You will never learn krackkid, but I will, and I’m really sure that EA games will let you work there with that shitty attitude…

Keep flaming me krackkid, I really have no sympathy for you what-so-ever… As I have already said, I will be leaving anyway so don’t make it worse, you could at least try to change and let me post honest opinions because obviously that’s what you do to me… So whatever, you can’t take what you dish out, then guess what else is going out…[/quote]

Or you could just ignore him when he flames you and not make things worse.

Read full topic

item.title: Adressment to modelers
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

How about you just leave? Ok really instead of posting get your sorry ass out of here. I am just sick and tired of every day coming here and seeing you like

OMFG I AM LEAVING
~next day~
New post from h1 sk1ller…

Pick if your going to leave or stay for the last time.
[hr]
The hole reason I got a bad attitude is because of you and your shitty ass way of picking if your going to stay or not, when the going get tuff you leave simple as that.
[hr]
and I been around this forums for a while I have learned a lot, and I know a lot about how things work around here. Also I haven’t flamed a person in the past week. which yes is good for me, normally I get a warning everyday.

[hr]

To sum it all up, you don’t need a thread, just leave
End of discussion.

Read full topic

You will never learn krackkid, but I will, and I’m really sure that EA games will let you work there with that shitty attitude…

Keep flaming me krackkid, I really have no sympathy for you what-so-ever… As I have already said, I will be leaving anyway so don’t make it worse, you could at least try to change and let me post honest opinions because obviously that’s what you do to me… So whatever, you can’t take what you dish out, then guess what else is going out…

item.title: Adressment to modelers
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

krackkid:

H1 you need the rod out of your ass. Your one of the biggest trolling flamers I seen in a long time. Alright sir? Understand now? YOU ARE A TROLLING FLAMER I should know I used to be one and this is going to get reported and I hope they finally ban you for saying your leaving and never do.

Firstly, can you fucking read? It’s because I thought (Moparscape) could fucking change…

Secondly, If I’m a troller, whatever I’m not even going to answer that, I really don’t care just whatever… If you think I am, then whatever, that’s a rod up your ass…

Read full topic

item.title: Adressment to modelers
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

shrogg:

[quote]Hello, I have been Hurting the users of this forum’s Moral for a long time now, I AM a troller, I won’t have come back, right? I never meant for (my COCK) to fuck you guys up so much…

Fixed
nah, you dont have to go, as-long as you dont cough cough flame cough troll cough abuse cough cough[/quote]

Awww, I’m sorry I didn’t add you on the list fuckwit! I really don’t care about wasting my time on theese forums just to help people that do fuck all, I don’t even get people commenting on my posts anymore saying (nice job) so fuck it…

Also, I really don’t care, flame me if you want, but I’m still going to leave either way so just fuck up if your going to be rude because it will be you that is the troller…

Read full topic
